movie.title: Lions Love
movie.description_intro: Three actors in Hollywood live and love together. A director comes from New York to make a movie about actors and Hollywood.
movie.description_full: Three actors in Hollywood live and love together. A director comes from New York to make a movie about actors and Hollywood.

movies.title: I Stand Alone
movies.summary: The Butcher (known from Noe's short film Carne) has done some time in jail after beating up the guy who tried to seduce his teenage mentally-handicapped daughter. Now he wants to start a new life. He leaves his daughter in an institution and moves to Lille suburbs with his mistress. She promised him a new butcher shop. She lied. The butcher decides to go back to Paris and find his daughter.
movies.description_full: The Butcher (known from Noe's short film Carne) has done some time in jail after beating up the guy who tried to seduce his teenage mentally-handicapped daughter. The butcher decides to go back to Paris and find his daughter.

movies.title: Throne of Elves
movies.summary: In the mythical Elven world of Altera, an epic battle unfolds between the beautiful Princess Liya and the Dark Elf Elena, who has gained possession of a jewel so powerful it allows its holder complete authority over all Alterans.
movies.description_full: In the mythical Elven world of Altera, an epic battle unfolds between the beautiful Princess Liya and the Dark Elf Elena, who has gained possession of a jewel so powerful it allows its holder complete authority over all Alterans.

movies.title: Secret Weapon
movies.summary: The film tells about the famous Soviet rocket launcher nicknamed "Katyusha", which was kept in great secrecy during World War 2. One of these unique killing machines has drowned during an unexpected retreat of the Russian troops. A special unit is sent to rescue the secret weapon that the Germans can never find - no matter what it takes .

movies.title: Tucker and Dale vs Evil
movies.summary: Two lovable hillbillies are headed to their "fixer-upper" vacation cabin to drink some beer, do some fishin', and have a good time. But when they run into a group of preppy college kids who assume from their looks that they must be in-bred, chainsaw-wielding killers, Tucker & Dale's vacation takes a bloody and hilarious turn for the worse.
